tool.name: Clip Grid with Rectangle
tool.description: Clips the input grid with the (rectangular) extent of a shapefile. The clipped grid will have the extent of the shapefile.<br/>Select shapes from the shapefile prior to tool execution in case you like to use only a subset from the shapefile for clipping.<br/><br/>

param.name: SHAPES
param.label: Extent
param.help: The shapefile to use for clipping.

param.name: BORDER
param.label: Border
param.help: Set grid extent to grid cells (pixel as area), to grid nodes (pixel as point) or align to grid system.
